replies.body: I liked the youthfulness of the OG Fiora. This Fiora could honestly pass for a lady in her 30s to 40s looking for some young blood.

Isn't she supposed to be a bit older? She originally refused to get married, which hopefully Demacians aren't marrying kids, so she'd be about 18 or so. Then there was the trail of her father, their duel, and his defeat. That should have taken about a year or so. After that, she became the head of the family, and in the years that followed, fought other people who disgraced her family name. To date, she's killed at least 30 people, which must be spread over a few years, since killing people normally keeps people from wagging their tongues for a while. 40 seems a bit old, but I could see late 20's to early 30's.
Mhm that would make sense. I never really considered her actual age but she always looked like she put on a few years with the update.

Of course. People age. Makes perfect sense for the champion's splashes to also appear to age as time goes on.

Riot's just preserving realism.
{{champion:1}} hmmmmmmmmm
{{champion:136}} never been more youthful. Only 13 billion years young
Name checks out
Sejuani also aged with hers. Traditional Sejuani is actually canonized as a younger Sej.

no, that's the reworked role.
They changed with the rework the following things about Fiora:
1) passive
2) Q
3) W
4) E
5) R
6) model
7) splash arts
8) lore
9) voice
they even wanted to change her title as well

The only thing that 'remains' of the original fiora is her name and title.
Now you have the behavior of a teenager in a mid 30s or mid 40s woman. And everyone 'omg rework soooo successful'
They didn't change her voice D:
maybe its the same voice actor, but they did change almost everything she says
At least in English they didn't. And as far as I know they only changed her voice in Latin American servers.
The current one also looks like a haughty, stuck-up bitch while original Fiora looks like shes having a good fight

Maybe the new Fiora isn't so bad after all...

The newer one is certainly more detailed, and therefore feels to me like it has more character to it; however, I like the idea of the original more.  I particularly prefer the hair on the old one, and think it would have just as much character to it if it was more detailed.

{{champion:202}} triggered

agree, as a original fiora main myself. The rework was disappointing
and the most disappointing part were how they reworked her model as well, even tho she had one of the better models they had in game

Old Fiora was like Miss Fortune with a rapier and more of a "you should know not to challenge me" whereas Miss Fortune was more like "just don't underestimate me".

I also liked Old Fiora's kit better since you could actually keep her down after a shitty lane phase.
yeah overall i LOVED old fiora, i played the crap out of her for a long time and she had clear strengths and weaknesses.

when she went off though it was almost impossible to stop her she could solo enemy teams she was broken she was a walking stat stick if you kept her how she was back then they would poppy her and make her worthless
she wasnt really much different than yi tbh.  i wont say she wasnt too strong at all but she certainly wasnt as broken as your comment makes her sound.

Yes she was that broken my comment is from experience she was a monster that you either stomped or in lane and killed the tower before she got enough items to delete you or you say you do stomp her she just comes back because your team is too stupid to end before she can half health half the team with her ult.
you say you speak from experience like youre one in a million, her rework wasnt THAT long ago.  i speak from experience too.  she was not much more op than yi
It's called "risk management", something that doesn't exist in this game anymore.
i understand champions can have win conditions but even then fiora...oh god the only thing i ever had to fight with her when i went off as her that shut me down was full ad (old) sion and maybe teemo

Ah, yes. The good old times when I was having fun berating VGU Fiora's face.

http://i.imgur.com/av7mqs6.png?
i think the top one is best, tbh but if the sane artist touched up the old fiora splash then itd prob be best
I legitimately like the idea of the old one. Yeah it's visually a downgrade but I liked it more.

I reallly liked her old design. Because I played a lot fiora prior rework it was hard to get used to the new one. Also, while I also love the VO of fiora overall I think it was strange to me that she didn't say anything when she ulted someone. And that I hardly heard her riposte quotes anymore :(.
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/E4EhV2vKBdQ/hqdefault.jpg
I will never forgive Rito for what they did to Fiora TwT
Ah the good old times of 124 ad fiora lvl1.
